document_data.name: Montgar's Horses
document_data.mainbody: '''Montgar's Horses''' was a business that sold [[horse]]s in the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned and run by [[Quen Montgar]]. A subsidiary was [[Montgar's Horse Outlet]] in the [[Port District (Procampur)|Port District]].{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet}}
